body_html:
So the proposed fix does NaN -> NaN similar to max. I didn't try to fix gradients for the nan case. This would involve keeping the values and I don't think that is worth it (in particular because I would not expect the pooling layer to be last, and otherwise we'd probably get NaN as grad_out).
If you are reasonably happy with it, I'd move it to a PR.
